org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout.CurveSegment

  • Packages that use CurveSegment 
    Package Description
    org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout
    Provides classes for the Layout package.
    org.sbml.jsbml.ext.render
    Provides classes for the render package, see the specification at sbml.org.

    • Uses of CurveSegment in org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout

      Subclasses of CurveSegment in org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CubicBezier
      Represents smooth curves in the Layout package.
      class  LineSegment
      The LineSegment class consists of the mandatory attribute xsi:type and two child elements of type Point.

      void ICurve.setListOfCurveSegments(ListOf<CurveSegment> listOfCurveSegments)
      The listOfCurveSegments element contains arbitrary number of curve segments that can be either of type LineSegment or of type CubicBezier.
